column2:
"The path to the ultimate drink.
I can see it, but it's still far...
...ah, hello, good day."

"You're the only one I'd even consider for
this super-secret job. After all, it involves
the peak of drink perfection!"

"And by peak of drink perfection, I mean none
other than Photon Drink EX, a breakthrough far beyond Photon Drink Z!"

"Its effects are nothing short of amazing!
You couldn't possibly refuse me now,
could you? It's settled, then!"

"Don't let me down. With the right
ingredients, I could whip up a
batch in no time!"
